TopicTitle: Autocraft. Looks a lot like KSP :D

Articles.Content:
http://www.autocraftgame.com/

You guys seen that? I'm not accusing them of ripping off KSP or anything of course, but sure looks inspired

Edited September 23, 2014 by guitarxe
I see a lot of Minecraft in there, not in the least in the name.
It's actually the name of a Minecraft mod. I'll have to check it out in depth when I get home.
Is it? I didn't know. A mix of Minecraft and KSP would be a monster I don't want to even imagine...
Idk, to me it looks like a strange hybrid of minecraft abd KSP conceptually, with an original art style that's kind if interesting...
The only thing it shares with KSP is space, and with Minecraft is "some cubes". That's it. Nothing else, move on.

Looks unique. They might be borrowing ideas from Many games then again the idea of what KSP does in a way in the sense of go from planet to planet seamless has been a goal and been used many times before. It's just our tech is at a level to actually perform it easier. So I would say not really KSP just more Minecraft.

Interesting. It appears to take some inspiration from KSP, though who knows if it has realistic celestial mechanics. The graphics may owe a little to Minecraft but it seems like mainly a unique style.

http://www.autocraftgame.com/

You guys seen that? I'm not accusing them of ripping off KSP or anything of course, but sure looks inspired

I'd say it's closer to robocraft in both style and game mechanics.

Looks less like Miencraft and more like Roblox before it went bad. Other than the square blocks, I couldn't find anything very Minecrafty about it - the planets and graphics are Roblox-like while the vehicles remind me of stamper-build vehicles or the first planes way more.

Have I enflicted the terrible curse of trolls by mentioning the game, or are we ok?
